short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to know your software seniority level

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My-level' is a user-friendly tool designed to assess your software expertise or seniority. It provides an objective evaluation of your current standing in the software industry based on a variety of technical and soft skills.

Key Features:

Technical Skills Evaluation: 'My-level' assesses a range of technical skills including programming languages, frameworks, databases, and more.

Soft Skills Evaluation: Recognizing the importance of soft skills in software industry, we also evaluate abilities like communication, project management, and leadership.

'My-level' offers a clear view of your standing in your software career and paths to improvement. Ideal for both seasoned professionals seeking career advancement and newcomers to the software field.
